name: Escape From Time Tower
description:
Please ensure you are over the age of 16 before playing this game, thank you.

Escape From Time Tower is a very early build experimental game being developed as a group project.

The key focus of the game-play and this test is the time manipulation mechanics the game provides which are currently a slow time where time flows as you move on the first level and a rewind time mechanic on the second level where the player can rewind time a few seconds on demand. Feedback on these mechanics would be very much appreciated as it will help us to further develop this project and understand what players want.

These time mechanics are built upon a top down, fast paced shooter. These mechanics are primarily in place as more of a test bed for the time mechanics systems and so are very basic but hopefully enjoyable enough for this test, feedback on these mechanics are very welcome also.

All feedback is welcome and we hope you enjoy what we have so far and look forward to hearing about your suggestions to improve the game design in our further development.
